ValidationRule.description: NOKIASC-29142: Only DV&T, System Admin and Data Loader can update Name of Workgroup.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( OR(ISCHANGED(Name), ISCHANGED( CH_Level_Of_Support__c ), ISCHANGED( CH_Type__c )), $RecordType.Name = "CH_CA_Workgroup", $Profile.Name<>'System Administrator', $Profile.Name<>'Data Loader Profile', NOT($Permission.CARE_DVT_Admin), NOT($Permission.CH_DVTAdminstration)
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not authorized to perform this action. Please raise a SF support ticket to DV&T team.
